entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -40.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 06:16 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -40.3°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -44.2°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
